# Shield of Faith, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 4]], [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]]

**Casting Time** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (parchment with a holy text written on it)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** Allied creatures in a 20-ft.-radius burst

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC)Â­, pg. 188

 This spell functions like *[[Shield of Faith (Spell)|shield of faith]]*, except that it affects multiple allies at a distance.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Artificer 4 to Level per Eberron Campaign Setting, pg. 115
